something like sshd, connection refused means that the port is closed

according to your msg a few min ago, : "but it keeps saying connection refused when i ssh ray@192.168.1.108"
ah ok, sorry, my mistake, i meant to say you should look at something like this : "root     17423     1  0 10:56 ?        00:00:00 /usr/sbin/sshd" if you dont, it means the ssh server is not running
you should look at the macs documentation to see how to enable the ssh server
